definition: to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
dispenser (for consumables such as liquid soap)/splitter (for cable TV signal etc)

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有問題，則會根據其類型進行重新分配。

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授權角色是必不可少的，這些角色上分配了人員。

sentences.english: Memory allocation failures should reduce the use of this flag.
sentences.chinese: 如果內存分配失敗過多，應該減少這個標記的使用。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不會自我調節，確保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 使用置換矩陣能夠根據每對符號單獨分配匹配得分。

sentences.english: This section explains how the queueing system distributes any remaining bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 這節解釋了排隊系統如何分配任何剩餘帶寬。

sentences.english: Some Super Automatic Espresso Machines will even froth and dispense milk automatically.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些自動咖啡機甚至會自動起泡沫並分配牛奶。

sentences.english: The thesis emphasizes the materiality of the compensation allocation first.
sentences.chinese: 論文首先強調了薪酬分配的重要性。

sentences.english: In a larger company, you would assign these roles to specific user groups.
sentences.chinese: 在較大的公司中，會將這些角色分配給特定的用戶組。

sentences.english: How much alloted for annual marketing efforts in total?
sentences.chinese: 每年你可用於營銷活動的費用分配是多少？

sentences.english: Use of VE-based distribution-type fuel injection pump.
sentences.chinese: 採用了VE型分配式噴油泵。

sentences.english: Quotas of the means of production are allocated by the higher administrative bodies to the lower ones.
sentences.chinese: 物資指標按隸屬關係分配。

sentences.english: A：Do you know when our governmental housing will be assigned?
sentences.chinese: 你知道政府福利房分配方案何時出臺嗎？

sentences.english: The Concurrent GC allocates memory while running but in the current segment which is 16 MB on a workstation.
sentences.chinese: 併發GC只在當前段上分配內存，通常是16M。

sentences.english: They span the planet, allocating resources as they see fit and competing to win customers.
sentences.chinese: 他們在全球合理分配資源，相互競爭以贏得客戶。

sentences.english: The outcome is decisions that feed the acquisition process, or reassignment of resources.
sentences.chinese: 結果是依靠獲取過程或者是資源的再分配的決定。

definition: to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
to divide up the work/division of labor
reception (of transmitted signal)/to receive/to accept/to admit/to take over (e.g. a factory)/to expropriate
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
